root: ^The War ended shortly after you took charge of House Cherry Blossom. Though the casualties faced in the short duration of the war were devastating, reparations were quickly made.

^Once some semblance of order had been restored, you dissolved House Cherry Blossom. The citizens were surprised, especially Ariar, but with your help, they were able to relocate and quickly built a sustainable life.
^With House Cherry dissolved, you finally regained your independence to pursue your own interests.
